remove underlines from links

ensure that website has valid format

Otherwise Android does not know, which activity to start, e.g.:

No Activity found to handle Intent { act=android.intent.action.VIEW
dat=bioeis-berlin.de/' (has extras) }
give the website string a nicer formatting

trim all string getters in gastro location

Make sure we don't get any spaces at the beginning or at the end.

ensure that gastro location getter do not return null

This reduces the number of possible NullPointerExceptions a lot.

do not misuse website getter for formatting

Better introduce separate method to avoid misunderstandings.

fix expandable text view on orientation change

Without this patch the expandable text view had the following behavior
on orientation change while in collapsed state: from portrait to
landscape the text would fit into less than three lines, from landscape
to portrait the ellipsis would not show.

This happened because the text, that would fit into the current layout,
was not re-calculated.

fix junit test

The main list activity was moved into a sub-directory. We have to change
the accessibility of createList(...) accordingly.
